metadata.dc:author: Villaãno Ansótegui, Marian
Fernández González, Rosario
Pérez Beltrán, Ana
Frías, Gil Sandra
metadata.dc:description: The authors describe the experience which the Apostle Santiago County Hospital in Miranda de Ebro, Burgos had when it implemented standardized treatment plans. This procedure is viewed satisfactorily and at the present time a direct follow-up process continues so that the quality of those parameters examined continues to improve.
metadata.dc:title: De proyecto a realidad. Implantación de planes de cuidados estandarizados.
[From project to reality. Implementation of standardized care plans].
